overview: An eerie erotic thriller about beautiful but tormented Samantha. On the outside her world is picture-perfect, but on the inside she is she is unraveling quickly with the constant fear that something sinister is lurking. Will she find herself pushed over the edge or will she find the strength to confront her demons, real or imaginary? Even though she's convinced, no one else believes someone or something is Watching Samantha...
title: Watching Samantha
